title: Ijaz expresses sorrow over loss of precious lives in accident at railways crossing
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 03 (APP):Interior Minister Brig (retired) Ijaz Ahmed Shah Friday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the loss of precious lives in an accident at railway crossing near Sheikhupura.
In his condolence message he prayed for the early recovery of the injured and
grant of courage to the deceasedsâ€™ families to bear this irreparable loss.
